name: Virgo Constellation Panda
description: In the Amazing Pandaverse, Virgo Panda is in charge of the Sixth house, the incarnation of the goddess of justice, and the biggest feature is analytical power. It is said that in the Ancient Pandaverse, Pandarians became intrigued by the dream of the golden myth, causing war and bloodshed. Virgo Panda opened the Pandora's box, representing fairness and justice that eventually ended the war, and was the patron saint of the Panda Wheel.
